decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: MW/0323/HP1; Location Plan; Photos dated 11/04/2023; MW/0323/HP2; MW/0323/HP3; Fire Safety Strategy dated 18/04/2023;
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The external surfaces of the proposed outbuilding hereby approved shall be constructed in accordance with the details provided within the submitted application form and Drawing No. MW/0323/HP3.
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - The proposed outbuilding hereby permitted shall only be used for purposes which are incidental to the enjoyment of the host dwelling at No. 3 Wynlie Gardens, Pinner, HA5 3TN and shall not be used as separate self contained accommodation.

REASON: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents and the character of the locality in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Detached outbuilding at rear for use as gym/office and storage
